note.p: Soldier. Son of Henry Johnson (1802/3–81) and Elizabeth Maria Johnson of Shrewsbury. Educated at Shrewsbury School. Lieutenant, Shropshire militia, 1871; lieutenant, Eighty-seventh Regiment, 1873. Retired and became a sheep farmer in South Africa.
